verbose_text: When bipolar kinetochore microtubule attachment (k-MT) occurs, inhibition of the CDC20 co-activator of the ubiquitin E3 ligase anaphase promoting complex / cyclosome (APC/C) is relieved, leading to polyubiquitination and degradation of Cyclin B and securin which promotes anaphase and mitotic exit.
evidence: ubiquitin E3 ligase anaphase promoting complex/cyclosome (APC/C
